text: Lili Anne Taylor (born February 20, 1967) is an American actress. She appeared in many independent movies. She was also in big budget movies including Ransom (1996) and The Conjuring (2013). She played Grace Stalker in Arizona Dream. She played Jojo Barbosa in Mystic Pizza in 1988. Taylor was born in Glencoe, Illinois. ==References== Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Illinois Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:People from Glencoe, Illinois
title: Lili Taylor
